html:
By S Anuradha

SINGAPORE, Dec 14 (IFR) - Amazon-backed Indian retail chain More Retail is hiring banks ahead of a planned domestic IPO of at least US$500m next year.

The company operates more than 600 grocery and household product stores.

Amazon and private equity fund Samara Capital Partners bought More Retail in 2018 from the Aditya Birla Group at an enterprise value of Rs42bn (then US$580m).

(Reporting by S Anuradha; Editing by Vincent Baby)

((Anuradha.subramanyan@refinitiv.com;))
